name: Stool in Plaster Blue
description:
Developed from the traditional milking stool, this three legged form is stable even on uneven surfaces.

The variation of colour within the seat is a result of the variation of pigments within the plaster mix: flow lines and patterns form as the mix is poured around the leg components.

450x300x300mm

*CARE INSTRUCTIONS* 
If dropped or knocked over on a hard surface, the seat is likely to chip or dent. Wipe clean with water only.

*DELIVERY*
Please allow 3-7 days for delivery
